data.comment: The big names in today's match at Renato Dall'Ara have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
In the minute 3, In Bologna, Bologna push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
Roma have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 5, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Andrea Poli.
Great play from Leonardo Spinazzola to set up the goal.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 7, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a throw-in for Bologna, close to Roma's area.
Bologna to take a throw-in in Roma territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Bologna in Bologna.
In the minute 10, Goal! Roma extend their lead to 0-2 through Edin Dzeko.
That's a fine assist from Lorenzo Pellegrini.
Edin Dzeko of Roma smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 14, Bologna drive forward but Rodrigo Palacio is judged offside.
Lorenzo Pellegrini puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-3.
Leonardo Spinazzola instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 16, Rodrigo Palacio for Bologna is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Roma a goal kick.
Leonardo Spinazzola of Roma is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 20, Can Bologna capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Roma's half?
Free kick for Bologna in the half of Roma.
Roma's Lorenzo Pellegrini is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Roma.
Roma attack but Edin Dzeko's header doesn't find the target.
Bologna have a goal kick.
In the minute 24, An unfortunate own goal by Bryan Cristante makes the score 1-3.
In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Bologna Roma attack through Edin Dzeko. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 25, Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
Throw-in for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Federico Ravaglia is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 28, Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bolognaâ€™s Federico Ravaglia is on his feet again at Renato Dall'Ara.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, Bologna needs to be cautious. Roma have an attacking throw-in.
Gianpaolo Calvarese blows against Roma's Edin Dzeko for offside.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Bologna.
In the minute 33, Mattias Svanberg (Bologna) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Roma at Renato Dall'Ara.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Roger Ibanez for Roma who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Roger Ibanez is back on his feet again.
In the minute 35, Goal! Roma extend their lead to 1-4 through Jordan Veretout.
That's a fine assist from Henrikh Mkhitaryan.
In the minute 36, Ball safe as Roma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Roma are coming forward and Leonardo Spinazzola gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bologna.
In the minute 37, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a Bologna throw-in in Roma's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick in a good position for Bologna!
In the minute 40, Bologna's Musa Barrow misses with an attempt on goal.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Roma a goal kick.
Bologna's Emanuel Vignato has run offside.
In the minute 42, Free kick Roma.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Jordan Veretout (Roma) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 44, Goal! Henrikh Mkhitaryan extends Roma's lead to 1-5.
Great play from Rick Karsdorp to set up the goal.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Roma in the half of Bologna.
Gianpaolo Calvarese will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Throw-in for Roma close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
The first-half is over at Renato Dall'Ara.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ibrahima Mbaye.
The second-half is underway in Bologna.
In the minute 46, Throw-in high up the field for Bologna in Bologna.
In the minute 46, Nehuen Paz is replacing Ibrahima Mbaye for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Gary Medel is on a sub for Andrea Poli for Bologna.
Bologna make their third substitution with Nicolas Dominguez replacing Mattias Svanberg.
Can Roma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?
Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
In the minute 48, Musa Barrow for Bologna is whistled offside.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
Free kick Bologna.
In the minute 49, Roger Ibanez for Roma has been booked by Gianpaolo Calvarese and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
Bologna are pushing forward but Rodrigo Palacio's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Renato Dall'Ara, Roberto Soriano has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 55, Rodrigo Palacio of Bologna is pulled up for offside.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
Free kick for Roma in the half of Bologna.
In the minute 61, Bologna's Rodrigo Palacio has run offside.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
Emanuel Vignato (Bologna) has received a yellow card from Gianpaolo Calvarese.
In the minute 63, Roma drive forward but Lorenzo Pellegrini is judged offside.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
The away team replace Marash Kumbulla with Chris Smalling.
In the minute 68, Roma to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
Corner awarded to Roma.
In Bologna, Chris Smalling (Roma) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 69, Goal kick for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Sinisa Mihajlovic is making the team's fourth substitution at Renato Dall'Ara with Andri Fannar Baldursson replacing Roberto Soriano.
Throw-in Bologna.
In the minute 70, Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Roma awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Bologna.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Bologna.
Throw-in for Roma at Renato Dall'Ara.
Henrikh Mkhitaryan for Roma gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 75, Bologna have a goal kick.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bologna.
In the minute 77, Throw-in Roma.
In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bologna's Andri Fannar Baldursson has been booked in Bologna.
In the minute 78, The home team have replaced Emanuel Vignato with Mattia Pagliuca. This is the fifth substitution made today by Sinisa Mihajlovic.
Nicolas Dominguez (Bologna) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bologna are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Roma in their own half.
Paulo Fonseca (Roma) is making a second substitution, with Borja Mayoral replacing Edin Dzeko.
Carles Perez is replacing Jordan Veretout for the away team.
In the minute 83, Bologna have a dangerous throw-in.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a Bologna throw-in in Roma's half.
Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
In the minute 84, Roma are on the attack at Renato Dall'Ara, where Borja Mayoral is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Goal kick for Roma at Renato Dall'Ara.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Roma.
Roma drives forward and Borja Mayoral gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 89, The match at Renato Dall'Ara has been interrupted briefly for a check on Gonzalo Villar, who is down injured.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese blows to end the match. The final score is 1-5.
Bologna's Nicolas Dominguez has been booked in Bologna.
Riccardo Calafiori is replacing Rick Karsdorp for the away team.
The away team have replaced Gonzalo Villar with Amadou Diawara. This is the fifth substitution made today by Paulo Fonseca.
